name: Ocean Cleanup Displeasure
description:
Can you beat your friends in a depressive attempt to clean a tiny part of the ocean?
In this game 4 players using controllers have to use their tail fins (by alternating the right stick between left and right to speed up) and hit 30 points of trash faster than their opponents by steering against them (using the left stick).
Smaller trash yields more points and if you manage to push trash into the "cleaning hole" you can get massive amounts of points at once and lift yourself up from a loosing into a winning position.
This game was created by a single person during a 48h game jam so don't expect too much ;-)
